com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage

Interface IDAuthority

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIDManager, ConsistentKeyIDManager, TransactionalIDManager

    (c) Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getIDBlock

        long[] getIDBlock(int partition)
                  throws StorageException
        Returns an array that specifies a block of idAuthorities, i.e. the idAuthorities between return[0] (inclusive) and return[1] (exclusive). It is guaranteed that the block of idAuthorities for the particular partition id is uniquely assigned, that is, the block of idAuthorities has not been previously and will not subsequently be assigned again when invoking this method on the local or any remote machine that is connected to the underlying storage backend.

        In other words, this method has to ensure that idAuthorities are uniquely assigned per partition.

        Parameters:
        partition - Partition for which to request an id block. Must be bigger or equal to 0
        Returns:
        a range of idAuthorities for the particular partition
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • peekNextID

        long peekNextID(int partition)

        Returns the smallest not yet allocated id for the given partition

        Returns:
        Throws:

      • getLocalIDPartition

        ByteBuffer[] getLocalIDPartition()
                                 throws StorageException
        Returns the lower and upper limits of the key range assigned to this local machine as an array with two entries.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • setIDBlockSizer

        void setIDBlockSizer(IDBlockSizer sizer)
        Sets the IDBlockSizer to be used by this IDAuthority. The IDBlockSizer specifies the block size for each partition guaranteeing that the same partition will always be assigned the same block size.

        The IDBlockSizer cannot be changed for an IDAuthority that has already been used (i.e. after invoking getIDBlock(int).

        Parameters:
        sizer - The IDBlockSizer to be used by this IDAuthority

      • close

        void close()
           throws StorageException
        Closes the IDAuthority and any underlying storage backend.
        Throws:
        StorageException
